name: Get my mind ready
description: Find 2 self-care activities and engage in one of the two activities at least once a week for one month.

name: Dealing with stress
description: I will create a list of at least 2 coping skills to use when feeling stressed or overwhelmed. I will keep track of how useful these coping skills were for 2 months.

name: Practice mindfulness
description: I will practice breathing exercises for 2 minutes at least 3 times a week for three weeks.

name: Gratitude
description: List 3 things I am grateful/thankful for daily for one month.
